q1: Will mpabe become the next best player?
a1: Mbappe is on his way to becoming one of the top players in the world.  His display at the world cup finals proved he is becoming one of the best.
q2: It is hard to disagree and he plays for one of the elite clubs with PSG which will only further increase his opportunities to become an elite player.
